summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy environment with a character engaged in combat with an enemy. The character is wielding a staff and appears to be mid-action, possibly attacking the enemy, who has a visible health bar above their head. The environment includes a stone path leading through a wooden torii gate, surrounded by snow-covered trees. The user interface displays several elements: a health and stamina bar at the bottom left, a set of icons indicating abilities or items on the left side, and a circular icon at the bottom right, possibly representing a map or special ability. Additionally, there is a text hint on the right side of the screen showing "Will" with a +4 and x13, likely indicating a resource or currency gained during gameplay.
